author: cbs8
title: Global Poultry Feed Ingredients Market 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Reportlinker
NEW YORK , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About poultry feed ingredients
Poultry feed is used to provide complete nutrition to livestock such as poultry. It includes feed cereals, cakes and meals, co-products from the food sector, minerals, additives, vitamins, oils and fats, and supplements such as silage of legumes, grass, and hay or harvested crops. Poultry feed has high fiber content, vitamins, minerals, and other nutritional components. The feed plays an important role in ensuring safe, affordable, and abundant animal protein.
Technavio's analysts forecast the global poultry feed ingredients market to grow at a CAGR of 5.32% over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this report
Based on type, the global poultry feed ingredients market can be segmented into energy source, plant protein source, animal protein source, mineral supplements, additives, and others.
Technavio's report, Global Poultry Feed Ingredients Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers APAC, Europe , North America , Latin America , and ROW; it also covers the global poultry feed ingredients market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion on the key vendors operating in this market.
